overview: Il turco in Italia (The Turk in Italy) is an opera in two acts by Gioachino Rossini. The Italian-language libretto was written by Felice Romani. It was a re-working of a libretto by Caterino Mazzol√† set as an opera (with the same title) by the German composer Franz Seydelmann in 1788.  Recorded at the Theatre by Caen, France, 1995 (Opera buffa in two acts)
title: Il Turco in Italia - Rossini
